account.member_tips_text: GaiYa is committed to being an excellent time management tool, always adhering to no ads, no interruptions, no redundancy, simple and pure. We will continue to provide a more pleasant user experience.\n\nAt the same time, we know that for a product to operate sustainably in the long run, it also needs a stable development model. If you are willing to support us, you can become a member and enjoy richer AI features. Thank you very much for your support!

dialog.title: Verify Your Email
dialog.sent_message_html:
We have sent a verification email to {email}.

Please open your inbox and click the verification link in the email to complete registration.

This window will automatically close and log you in after verification.
dialog.tips_html:
üí° Tips:
‚Ä¢ Check your spam folder
‚Ä¢ Verification link is valid for 24 hours
‚Ä¢ If you didn't receive the email, click below
dialog.welcome_message: Welcome! {email}\n\nYou have successfully registered and logged into GaiYa Daily Progress Bar.

template_page.title: Select Task Template
template_page.subtitle: We recommend 3 popular templates, choose the one that suits you best to get started quickly
template_page.ai_option_label: Or, let AI intelligently generate tasks based on your needs:
template_page.ai_note: üí° Click to close the wizard and open the configuration interface to use AI generation

work_weekday.name: üìä Workday Template
work_weekday.description: Suitable for office workers. Includes: commute, meetings, work, lunch break, dinner, study and other typical workday tasks.

student.name: üéì Student Template
student.description: Suitable for students. Includes: morning reading, classes, self-study, sports, club activities and other campus life tasks.

freelancer.name: üíº Freelancer Template
freelancer.description: Suitable for freelancers. Includes: client communication, project development, creative time, rest and other flexible time arrangements.
